Title:               Personal Consumption Expenditures: Chain-type Price Index
Series ID:           PCECTPI
Source:              U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis
Release:             Gross Domestic Product
Seasonal Adjustment: Seasonally Adjusted
Frequency:           Quarterly
Units:               Index 2012=100
Date Range:          1947-01-01 to 2020-01-01
Last Updated:        2020-05-28 8:07 AM CDT
Notes:               BEA Account Code: DPCERG
                     
                     A Guide to the National Income and Product Accounts of the United
                     States (NIPA) - (http://www.bea.gov/national/pdf/nipaguid.pdf)
